name: Test Drive Unlimited Gold
summary: Includes the original game with latest official patch and the Test Drive Unlimited Megapack add-on. The add-on includes 45 cars from manufacturers such as Holden, Edonis, RUF, Lexus and others, one motorcycle, a mode of increased realism of driving vehicles, an improved steering support system, as well as support for widescreen resolution, which is also present in the console versions of the game.
